amendment.description: Amendment provides that closures of hunter access corridors shall be clearly marked with signs and dates of closures, but shall not include barriers on the corridors.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 5 printed in House Report 114-429 to add a specification that closures of hunter access corridors shall be clearly marked with signs and dates of closures, but shall not include barriers on the corridor.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Smith (MO) amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Smith (MO).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Smith (MO) amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
